Dear Prank:
John Holt has just written to me concern¬
ing a proposed series of programs called "Straight
Talk about Psychology."
Prom the information given I cannot get
too excited about the series because it seems like
one that might more suitably be presented on a
commercial station. Educational broadcasters, as
far as I know, have not been interested in pro¬
grams that primarily correct misconceptions.
Rather, they present informational programs in a
straightforward manner with a more positive
approach.
In addition, a program such as this does
not seem to cover an area in which we have been
inactive. My recommendation, therefore, is that
we do not consider this proposal at this time.
With all best wishes, I am
